title: Daisy Lowe, 30, steps out 'after splitting from boyfriend Cameron McMeikan, 24'
text:
She's alleged to have split from her boyfriend Cameron McMeikan, 24, over their six-year age difference.

And Daisy Lowe, 30, seemed in good spirits when she headed out to run errands on Thursday, accompanied by her pet pooch Monty.

The model wore a low-key, sportswear inspired look, donning a pair of tracksuit bottoms and a simple white T-shirt.

Leisurely walk: Daisy Lowe, 30, seemed in good spirits when she headed out to run errands on Thursday, accompanied by her pet pooch Monty

Daisy layered up with an denim parka and opted for comfort in a pair of chunky combat boots.

The star sported barely-there make-up for her outing and wore her brunette locks down loose.

She was in deep conversation as she she ambled along the street, her phone glued to her left ear.

Chatting away: She was in deep conversation as she she ambled along the street, her phone glued to her left ear

Daisy's outing comes after it was revealed she had split from Cameron McMeikan, 24, who she dated for almost a year before reportedly splitting over their six-year age gap.

The duo were first romantically linked when they were seen sharing a kiss during a low-key date in October last year.

A source told The Sun: 'They remain on good terms and Daisy is loving being single and hanging out with friends and family.

Partying in style: Earlier this week, Daisy was supporting Nikolai Von Bismark at the launch party for his new book with Dior, The Dior sessions

'She hasn't been on hr own for ages and it feels like the right time.'

A source told The Mirror of their romance last year: 'It has been a while since Daisy had a serious boyfriend and she has grown really close to Cameron.

'They have been secretly dating for months and really enjoy each other's company.'

Daisy, whose dating history includes The Crown's Matt Smith, Hurts singer Theo Hutchcraft and Thomas Cohen, was previously romantically linked to artist John Leigh.
description: Daisy Lowe, 30, seemed in good spirits when she headed out to run errands on Thursday, accompanied by her pet pooch Monty.
